text: <@U6GNQ7JBU> FYI: *Design Manager doesn't recognize changes anymore* after publishing a template. A browser window refresh, after publishing templates, is required to restore the automatic save functionality and allows publishing recent changes. Yesterday everthing was fine. Discovered (25.08.2021 8:05 UTC+2) (Browser: SRWare Iron Version 88.0.4500.0)
